DOC.criteria: Female diagnosis IC/PBS implant IPG Interstim . Scores > 8 Interstitial Cystitis Symptom index questionnaire ( ICSI ) > 8 Interstitial Cystitis Problem Index questionnaire ( ICPI ) . Signed Informed Consent . Progressive neurologic disease peripheral neuropathy . History bladder surgery . Subjects implanted neuromodulation device . Current planning pregnancy ; Breastfeeding .
